模块 com.example.BubbleBobble
程序包 com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.Character

类 Enemy

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
com.example.BubbleBobble.GameObject
com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.Character.GameCharacter
com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.Character.Enemy
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Enemy extends GameCharacter
An Enemy is a non-controllable main.GameObject that kills the main.Hero whenever it or its projectile comes in contact. Enemies are able to be bubbled and free themselves from these bubbles after a period of time. Enemies change direction at random intervals, when hitting a wall, and when hitting the main.Hero's shield. Enemies jump at random intervals as well.

  • 属性概要

    • updateWithDifficulty

      private void updateWithDifficulty​(String difficulty)
      update the enemy according to different types of difficulty in following format: .
      1. "easy": the change-movement possibility was set to 0.005
      2. "medium": the change-movement possibility was set to 0.01
      3. "hard": the change-movement possibility was set to 0.02
      参数:
      difficulty -

    • X_terminal_speed_difficulty

      参数:
      Difficulty - the current game difficulty
